title: Child molestation: when to say no
creator_credit: Elizabeth Young, Dana Young and Charles Cahill and Associates
brief_description: Uses four dramatisations to illustrate typical encounters between a child and a child molester. Shows the child how to thwart the attempt of molestation and stresses the importance of reporting such incidents to a responsible adult. Suitable for middle and upper primary school levels.
